addProductToStore(bytes32,bytes32,bytes3.details: This function adds a new product to store.  Also a new entry is added to productNames array in that store.

params._productName: - name of product to add to store
params._stockBalance: - how many units of that product are there in store/inventory

addStore(bytes32,bytes32).details: This function creates a new store. The new store is  added to stores mapping, which maintains list of stores for each  store owner. The index of store added is captured in indexofStores mapping, for ready reference.

addStoreOwner(address).details: This function adds a store owner

getAllOwnerStores(address,uint256).details: This function gets all the stores owned by a particular store owner

params._nextIndex: - next index used for iteratively getting all the stores of a particular store owner

getProductsInStore(address,bytes32,uint2.details: This function gets all the products in a store

params._nextIndex: - next index used for iteratively getting all the products in the store
params._storeName: - name of the store from which to get products

getStoreIndex(address,bytes32).details: This function gets the index of a store form the storeIndices mapping

params._storeName: - name of the store, whose index is to be retrieved

purchaseItem(address,bytes32,bytes32,uin.details: This function enables a user to purchase an item from a store

params._productName: - name of product to be removed from store
params._purchaseQty: - quantity of product(s) to be purchased The product is removed from products array for that store.
params._storeName: - name of store from which product to be purchased

removeProductFromStore(bytes32,bytes32).details: This function removes a product from a store

params._productName: - name of product to be removed from store The product is removed from products array for that store.
params._storeName: - name of store from which product has to be removed

params.name: - name of store to remove. The store is removed from stores array, and also corresponding index entry is removed in indexOfStores

removeStoreOwner(address).details: This function removes a store owner

params.storeOwner: - address of store owner to remove

withdrawSalesBalance().details: This function enables a storeowner to withdraw his/her sales proceeds The owner sales balance is updated to zero
